item.title: Recovery admin password for grafana
item.description: Intro Sometimes you need to enter in your grafana system, but for some reason, you lost your admin password. If are you using sqlite as backend storage? Then following these steps: In your local machine, install the sqlite3 package sudo apt-get install sqlite3 Login to the database sudo sqlite3 /var/lib/grafana/grafana.db Reset the admin password to “admin” sqlite> update user set password = '59acf18b94d7eb0694c61e60ce44c110c7a683ac6a8f09580d626f90f4a242000746579358d77dd9e570e83fa24faa88a8a6', salt = 'F3FAxVm33R' where login = 'admin'; sqlite> .
